Text:
"spastik" is an appropriate username for you my friend.
let me give you a hot tip, if you are going to upload a torrent for thousands of people to download, then don't section the torrent off into "1st half, 2nd half, extratime, penalties". it's called a spoiler. just divide the whole file into 3 parts to download.
it's hard enough not being in english!
Does anyone have the pre game show for the final .. big big thanks..
